name: BookIt!
tagline: Easy-to-use interface for booking meeting rooms managed using Google Calendar
body:
# Book Rooms with ease

BookIt is the software used internally by EnergySavvy so we can instantly book rooms for impromptu meetings.

![Screenshot of BookIt on tablet](2016-09-29 BookIt product screenshot on tablet.png)

## Why?

We at EnergySavvy love the Google Calendar platform for managing shared, schedulable resources, but when we needed a room _right now_ the Google Calendar interface was too clunky. Rooms were poached, room squatters were rampant, and anarchy reigned. Nobody wants to get kicked out of a room or show up for their rightfully-booked meeting only to find the room occupied. Our Seattleite non-confrontational attitude forced us to find a solution.

## Open Source

BookIt was built at EnergySavvy as a hackathon project because the off-the-shelf options were expensive and clunky. We've open-sourced it so that you can use it yourself. Just create your own .json data file with your resource IDs and floor layout. Instructions are in our [README](https://github.com/EnergySavvy/bookit/).

### Support or Contact

Having trouble with BookIt? Drop us a line in the [issues](https://github.com/EnergySavvy/bookit/issues) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
